sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This chapter describes each entity that can be created within a Deployment Diagram. Note that some subentities of entities on the diagram may not actually themselves appear on the diagram.
There is a close relationship between this material and the Properties Tab of the Details Pane (see ). That section covers Properties in general, in this chapter they are linked to specific entities.

Of particular importance are the sections on Property Toolbars (see ) and Common Property Sheet Features (see ). These document the toolbar buttons and key features that are common to most Property Sheets.
